title: made font w/typetool
content:
I made a Mac font with type tool which I can print to a laserprinter, but when I send it to print, Quark 6.5 gives me a message that says “font may be corrupt”.

Anyone else had this?
author: allenhanford

comments.content: Yes: Font Doctor usually fixes the problem, but not always. When it doesn’t, I usually revert to Fontographer to generate the font, and there’s no problem.
A program that comes with Extensis Suitcase (at least the later versions)…a very handy tool to have.
Thanks a bunch! I’ll give it a try.
